title: Cheeky prankster scares family by sneaking up on them and blowing an air horn in their faces
text:
Hilarious footage shows a man scaring his friends and family several times with an air horn.

The clip shows the reactions of the victims of the prank, with the video recorded in various locations in Elizabethtown, Kentucky, US.

The man would sneak up to his family and friends and, when they aren't expecting it, blow the air horn in their face.

Reactions were varied, with some people barely reacting while others screamed in shock and horror.

Several dropped what they were holding, with one woman even cursing, to her horror and the prankster's delight.

Although surprise was the main response, some people looked close to anger.

The name of the prankster is unclear and it is unknown when the individual pranks were filmed, but the video was uploaded on October 26.

The prankster terrified his victims, with this family member even swearing in shock, before being mortified with her reaction

Reactions were varied, with some people barely reacting while others screamed in shock and horror

Some people dropped what they were holding, including this man who dropped his food

Although most of the victims appear to be the man's family and friends, he also seems to be targeting some members of the public.

No one seems safe from his cheeky tricks and he repeats the joke at home, on the street and even at sporting events.

One friend almost drops a burger, another man drops his drink while several people scream in terror.
description: The clip shows the reactions of the victims of the prank after they have the air horn blown in their face, with the video recorded in various locations in Elizabethtown, Kentucky, US.
